DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety pharmacokinetics DW-0919 DW-0920 healthy male volunteer fast condition .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Study DW-0919 & DW-0920 Healthy Male Volunteers Under Fasting Condition
DOC.criteria: Adult male age 20 55 year screen . No significant congenital/chronic disease . No symptoms physical examination . Appropriate subject determine past medical history , laboratory test , serology urinalysis . Be able understand objective , method study , characteristic investigational drug , comply requirement study . Subject must provide write informed consent prior study participation . History Hyperreactivity drug ingredient ( acetaminophen , tramadol ) opioids . History presence liver , kidney , nervous system disease , respiratory disorder , endocrinological disorder , hematooncologic , cardiovascular psychiatric cognitive disorder . History gastrointestinal disorder ( bleed , ulceration , hemorrhoid , pile ) disorder absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion .
